com.jnape.palatable.lambda.functions.specialized

Interface Cokleisli<A,B,W extends com.jnape.palatable.lambda.comonad.Comonad<?,W>>

  • Type Parameters:
    A - the extraction value of the input Comonad
    W - the Comonad unification parameter
    B - the output argument type
    All Superinterfaces:
    com.jnape.palatable.lambda.functor.Applicative<B,com.jnape.palatable.lambda.functions.Fn1<com.jnape.palatable.lambda.comonad.Comonad<A,W>,?>>, com.jnape.palatable.lambda.functor.Cartesian<com.jnape.palatable.lambda.comonad.Comonad<A,W>,B,com.jnape.palatable.lambda.functions.Fn1<?,?>>, com.jnape.palatable.lambda.functor.Cocartesian<com.jnape.palatable.lambda.comonad.Comonad<A,W>,B,com.jnape.palatable.lambda.functions.Fn1<?,?>>, com.jnape.palatable.lambda.functor.Contravariant<com.jnape.palatable.lambda.comonad.Comonad<A,W>,com.jnape.palatable.lambda.functor.Profunctor<?,B,com.jnape.palatable.lambda.functions.Fn1<?,?>>>, com.jnape.palatable.lambda.functions.Fn1<com.jnape.palatable.lambda.comonad.Comonad<A,W>,B>, com.jnape.palatable.lambda.functor.Functor<B,com.jnape.palatable.lambda.functions.Fn1<com.jnape.palatable.lambda.comonad.Comonad<A,W>,?>>, com.jnape.palatable.lambda.monad.Monad<B,com.jnape.palatable.lambda.functions.Fn1<com.jnape.palatable.lambda.comonad.Comonad<A,W>,?>>, com.jnape.palatable.lambda.functor.Profunctor<com.jnape.palatable.lambda.comonad.Comonad<A,W>,B,com.jnape.palatable.lambda.functions.Fn1<?,?>>
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface Cokleisli<A,B,W extends com.jnape.palatable.lambda.comonad.Comonad<?,W>>
extends com.jnape.palatable.lambda.functions.Fn1<com.jnape.palatable.lambda.comonad.Comonad<A,W>,B>
    The Cokleisli arrow of a Comonad, as a convenience wrapper around a Fn1<WA, B>. This can be thought of as a fixed, portable Comonad.extend(Fn1).

      Adapt a compatible function into a Cokleisli arrow.

        default <C> Cokleisli<A,C,W> andThen(Cokleisli<B,C,W> after)
        Left-to-right composition of two compatible Cokleisli arrows, yielding a new Cokleisli arrow.
        Type Parameters:
        C - the new return parameter type
        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Adapt a compatible function into a Cokleisli arrow.
        Type Parameters:
        A - the input parameter type
        B - the output argument type
        W - the Comonad unification parameter
        WA - the input Comonad type
        Parameters:
        fn - the function
        Returns:
